metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for elderly Colombian coffee farmer character

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Wake Up
scenes.lighting: dark, rooster crowing outside, hint of pre-dawn
scenes.description: A 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray short hair, and gray mustache lies in a simple wooden bed with white sheets and a colorful hand-woven blanket (cobija). The room is dark, but through the window, the first hint of pre-dawn light touches the sky. An old alarm clock on a wooden nightstand shows 5:00. Religious images (Virgen del Carmen) hang on the white-washed walls. His wife María sleeps beside him.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, simple rural Colombian bedroom at pre-dawn, 67-year-old man with tan weathered skin, gray short hair, gray mustache, lying in wooden bed, white sheets, colorful woven blanket, wife sleeping beside, wooden nightstand with alarm clock, religious images on white walls, Virgin Mary picture, window showing hint of dawn, tile floor, traditional finca
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bedroom, urban, young man, pale skin, no mustache

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Jorge sits on the edge of the simple wooden bed, feet touching the cool tile floor. He wears a plain white undershirt and loose cotton pants. His gray hair is slightly mussed. His wife María still sleeps beside him under the colorful blanket. The room is sparse: wooden wardrobe, chair with clothes, religious image, small mirror.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, sitting on edge of wooden bed, feet on cool tile floor, wearing white undershirt and loose pants, wife sleeping under colorful blanket behind, wooden wardrobe and chair visible, simple rural bedroom, dim dawn light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bedroom, young man, pale skin, no mustache, carpet floor

scenes.title: Morning Prayer
scenes.description: Jorge stands before a small home altar in the corner of the bedroom—a shelf with a statue of the Virgin Mary, a small cross, dried flowers, and a candle (unlit). He makes the sign of the cross, head bowed briefly in morning prayer. His tan, weathered hands are folded.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, standing before small home altar, Virgin Mary statue on shelf, small cross, dried flowers, unlit candle, hands folded in prayer, head bowed, making sign of cross, dim bedroom light, traditional Catholic devotion, rural Colombian finca
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern room, young man, pale skin, no religious imagery

scenes.title: Getting Dressed
scenes.description: Jorge pulls on work clothes: a faded plaid long-sleeve cotton shirt (blue and white), sturdy khaki work pants. He sits on the bed edge to put on thick socks. The wooden wardrobe behind him is open, showing simple clothing.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, getting dressed in bedroom, putting on faded blue and white plaid long-sleeve shirt, khaki work pants, sitting on bed putting on thick socks, open wooden wardrobe with simple clothes, dawn light through window, traditional finca bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern clothes, fancy wardrobe, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Wide-Brimmed Hat
scenes.description: Jorge takes his wide-brimmed straw hat (sombrero aguadeño) from a hook on the wall. The hat is weathered and well-worn, shaped by years of use. He places it on his head, the brim shading his face. The hat is part of his daily uniform.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing plaid shirt and work pants, taking weathered wide-brimmed straw hat from wall hook, placing sombrero aguadeño on head, brim shading face, early morning light, traditional Colombian farmer, finca interior
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, baseball cap, modern hat, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Heating Water on Stove
scenes.description: Jorge places a metal kettle on the wood-burning stove. The stove already has some coals glowing. Wood is stacked beside the stove. The kettle is blackened from years of use. He'll make tinto (black coffee) before starting work.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing plaid shirt and straw hat, placing blackened metal kettle on wood-burning stove (fogón de leña), glowing coals visible, firewood stacked beside stove, traditional Colombian farmhouse kitchen, morning light, preparing to make coffee
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern stove, electric kettle, gas stove, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Making Tinto
scenes.description: Jorge pours hot water through a cloth coffee filter (colador) into a metal pot. Ground coffee fills the cloth. The dark liquid drips through. The rich aroma of Colombian coffee fills the kitchen. This is coffee from his own farm.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, pouring hot water through traditional cloth coffee filter (colador) into metal pot, ground coffee in cloth filter, dark coffee liquid dripping through, traditional Colombian tinto preparation, farmhouse kitchen, morning light, rich coffee aroma
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern coffee maker, drip machine, espresso machine, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Drinking First Coffee
scenes.description: Jorge stands by the kitchen window, drinking tinto from a small metal cup. The coffee is strong and black, sweetened with panela. Through the window, the coffee plantation stretches out in the early morning mist, rows of coffee plants on the hillside.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing plaid shirt, standing by farmhouse kitchen window, drinking tinto (black coffee) from small metal cup, looking out window at coffee plantation in morning mist, rows of coffee plants on hillside visible, Andes mountains in distance, peaceful morning moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, large coffee mug, modern kitchen, urban view, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Breakfast Spread
scenes.description: The breakfast spread on the wooden table: huevos pericos (scrambled eggs with tomato and onion), arepas, queso fresco (white cheese), fried plantains (tajadas), hot chocolate, and more tinto. A simple but hearty Colombian campo breakfast.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, traditional Colombian breakfast spread on wooden table, huevos pericos (scrambled eggs with tomato and onion), arepas (corn cakes), queso fresco (white cheese), fried plantains (tajadas), cup of hot chocolate, tinto (black coffee), farmhouse kitchen, morning light, hearty campo breakfast, no people, food still life
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, American breakfast, cereal, modern plates, restaurant

scenes.title: Eating Breakfast
scenes.description: Jorge and María sit at the table eating breakfast together. Jorge spoons huevos pericos onto an arepa. María pours chocolate from a pot. They eat in comfortable silence, occasionally exchanging a few words. The window shows bright morning outside.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian couple eating breakfast at wooden table, 67-year-old man with tan skin, gray hair, gray mustache spooning huevos pericos onto arepa, 65-year-old woman with gray braided hair pouring hot chocolate from pot, plates with Colombian breakfast foods, bright morning light from window, comfortable married couple, farmhouse kitchen
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young couple, modern kitchen, single person, restaurant

scenes.title: Leaving House
scenes.description: Jorge steps out the front door of the finca onto the covered porch. The traditional farmhouse has white-washed walls, red tile roof, wooden columns supporting the porch (corredor). Potted flowers line the porch. Mountains visible in misty distance. The coffee plantation stretches before him.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing plaid shirt, work pants, rubber boots, straw hat, stepping out front door of traditional finca onto covered porch (corredor), white-washed walls, red tile roof, wooden columns, potted flowers, view of coffee plantation and misty Andes mountains, early morning light, Quindio Colombia
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern house, flat land, no mountains, urban, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Porch View
scenes.description: Wide view from the farmhouse porch (corredor). The covered porch has wooden beams, rocking chairs, a hammock in the corner. Beyond, the landscape: terraced hillsides covered in coffee plants, banana trees mixed among the coffee, the Andes mountains in the misty background. Classic Quindío coffee country.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, view from traditional Colombian farmhouse porch (corredor), covered porch with wooden beams, wooden rocking chairs, hammock in corner, spectacular view of terraced hillsides covered in coffee plants, banana trees mixed in, Andes mountains in misty background, classic Quindio Eje Cafetero landscape, early morning golden light, beautiful scenery
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, flat land, no mountains, urban, desert, no vegetation

scenes.title: After Lunch Rest
scenes.description: After lunch, Jorge sits in a rocking chair on the porch. It's hot—the traditional siesta time. He rocks gently, eyes closed, digesting. The hammock sways in a breeze. Birds sing in the trees. A brief rest before afternoon work.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 67-year-old Colombian man with tan weathered skin, gray hair, gray mustache, sitting in wooden rocking chair on farmhouse porch, eyes closed, resting after lunch, hammock swaying in breeze nearby, hot afternoon, siesta time, peaceful rest, traditional finca corredor, coffee country landscape in background
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, pale skin, modern furniture, inside room

scenes.title: Evening Tinto
scenes.description: Jorge sits on the porch with a small cup of evening tinto. María joins him. They sit in comfortable silence, watching the sunset paint the mountains pink and orange. The farm is quiet. The day's work is done.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian couple sitting on farmhouse porch in rocking chairs, 67-year-old man with tan skin, gray hair, gray mustache holding small cup of tinto, 65-year-old woman with gray braided hair beside him, watching sunset over Andes mountains, sky painted pink and orange, peaceful evening, day's work complete, traditional finca, Quindio Colombia
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young couple, modern chairs, inside room, no mountains, daytime

scenes.title: Sunset Over Mountains
scenes.description: The view from the porch: the sun setting behind the Andes, sky turning orange and pink, the coffee plantation in silhouette. Jorge and María sit in rocking chairs, appreciating the beauty of their land. A daily ritual of gratitude.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, spectacular sunset view from Colombian farmhouse porch, sun setting behind Andes mountains, sky turning brilliant orange and pink, coffee plantation in silhouette, elderly couple in rocking chairs watching (shown from behind), daily ritual of gratitude, beautiful Quindio Colombia landscape, golden hour, peaceful evening
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, daytime, cloudy, no mountains, flat land, urban
